entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
